CONVERSATION GROUP: The halfling's name is Belamy and his actions serve you right for what you've done.
No... I suppose not. I... expect too much from the people we were sent to kill.
Tell us why you attacked us, and we'll let you live.
I don't know who wants you dead, or why.<removed     I only know we were... hired to kill you and those of your guild. For what it's worth, I am sorry.
You were only doing what you were paid to do. I understand.

I have a son in Luskan... his name's Rabil. With me gone, he will have... nothing. All I have of value is an amulet... worth enough to feed and clothe him for a few months. I need someone to make sure it gets to Rabil.
BK cut " and I... can't move my arms to... get it for you." to make injury consistent
I.... Thank you. I never expected such kindness! I will return to my son in Luskan... and I will never lift a sword again! I'll... I need a minute, and then I'll be off.
